_comment: Vital for logs and SIEM ingestion / future multi-tool setups.
tool.name: SentinelNet

_comment: Interface: Defines the network adapter to listen on.
bpf_filter: Enables Berkeley's kernel-level packet filtering for reduced CPU load and traffic volume.
store_packets: Defines if packets are kept in memory, default to false for long-running detection.
disallowed_ports: Defines which ports are considered insecure or unauthorized.
cleartext_http_basic_auth: Inspects packet payload for Basic <base64> authorization (Cleartext credentials = immediate exposure).
ftp_cleartext_credentials: Inspects packet payloads for USER/PASS due to FTP being inherently insecure.
legacy_name_resolution: Detects legacy broadcast name resolutions which are often abused for credential poisoning.
alerts_path: Defines where alert logs are stored.
console: Defines whether alerts are printed to the terminal.
